title: Mainnet node is stuck at block 15085353

labels.name: TeamRevenant
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Revenant Team

body:
I running besu node in docker. 
```
version: "3.5"
services:
  ethereum:
    image: hyperledger/besu:22.7
    restart: always
    network_mode: host
    volumes:
      - ./data:/opt/besu/database/
    command:
      --network=mainnet
      --rpc-http-enabled
      --sync-mode=fast
      --host-allowlist=*
      --nat-method=upnp
      --Xdns-enabled=true
      --rpc-http-api=ETH,NET,CLIQUE,DEBUG,MINER,NET,PERM,ADMIN,EEA,TXPOOL,PRIV,WEB3
      --logging=DEBUG
```
Tonight the node is stuck at block 15085353. Besu version was 22.4.3, today I've updated to 22.7 but it doesn't help
Some log excerpts:

```
ethereum_1  | 2022-07-07 08:45:26.894+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-6 | DEBUG | EthProtocolManager | Peer 0x200778efd1f8cc2360... PeerReputation 100, validated? false, disconnected? false has mismatched network id: 190260
```

any ideas?
Could you provide your complete log file? The part that you have shared does not indicate why the node is stuck.
The only thing that I can see in the log files is that the node is trying to find peers, but does not succeed. Did you have other versions of Besu running in the past and could connect to peers?
@daniellehrner No, I'm running besu node for the 1st time. It syncing from scratch and stuck at block 5085353

@daniellehrner Hi. I launched besu from scratch. It stuck again, but other block 15121585. Full log
[besu15121585.log](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/files/9109769/besu15121585.log)

that log makes it look like besu is not actually stuck but is downloading the worldstate.  See the log line about 1 minute before the end of the file:
```
{"log":"2022-07-13 07:48:10.237+00:00 | EthScheduler-Services-7 (requestCompleteTask) | INFO  | CompleteTaskStep | Downloaded 590616834 world state nodes. At least 16751 nodes remaining.\n","stream":"stdout","time":"2022-07-13T07:48:10.237206725Z"}
```

The other "found common ancestor" log lines are just noisy peering log lines.  Did this node eventually finish downloading the world state and/or select a newer pivot block than 15121585?
marking this as fixed with #4175.  If this doesn't unblock, we can reopen.

@garyschulte I started besu 22.7.06, but it got stuck again at block 15267497
